children: “Lose Yourself” is the theme song from Eminem’s semi-biographical 2002 movie
. Eminem is narrating the life of the film’s protagonist, Jimmy, up until the third verse, where Jimmy and Eminem’s journey converge.

The song was lauded critically, too. It won
